statements: DELETE FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact WHERE city_name = 'New York';
DELETE FROM UrbanDevelopmentImpact WHERE city_name='New York' AND infrastructure_rating > 8
DELETE FROM Infrastructure WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Infrastructure WHERE city = 'New York' AND public_transit_usage > 0.5;
DELETE FROM Infrastructure WHERE type = 'Road' AND construction_year < '2020-01-01';
DELETE FROM emissions_data WHERE city_id = 1 AND year = 2020;
DELETE FROM building_data WHERE city_id = (SELECT city_id FROM city_data WHERE city_name = 'New York') AND construction_year < 2000;
